post:
Hello,

I'm selling this VPS from DotVPS located in UK, because I don't need it anymore. **It's paid till 05.06.2014. Nearly a year!**

Specs:
[OpenVZ] 64MB
Dedicated RAM: 64 MB
Disk Space: 4 GB
Bandwidth:500GB
Dedicated IP's:1 IP

**original price: 10$**
**my price 8$**

_the price is not fixed :P_
I asked @Jack and he allowed this, you can transfer the server to your account!

regards,
trexos
